# Tee Time - Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
- **Name:** Tee Time
- **Type:** SvelteKit Web Application
- **Language:** TypeScript
- **Package Manager:** pnpm
- **UI Framework:** Svelte + SvelteKit

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold the Project with SvelteKit
- [x] Install Dependencies with pnpm
- [x] Customize Project Structure
- [x] Verify Build Configuration
- [x] Create and Run Dev Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Finalize Documentation

## Notes
- Using TypeScript for type safety
- SvelteKit provides SSR and routing capabilities
- pnpm ensures fast, efficient dependency management
